<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Slayer's Blessing](/Feats.aspx?ID=3481) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Manipulate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=104" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Book of the Dead](/Sources.aspx?ID=118) pg. 29</row>

**Archetype** [Undead Slayer](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=174)

**Prerequisites**
[Slayer's Strike](/Feats.aspx?ID=3478)

</column>

---

You carry scraps of materials dangerous to undead and can apply them to your weapon. When you use Slayer's Strike, before making the Strike, you can choose either the [_ghost touch_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=297) property rune or a precious material: [cold iron](/Equipment.aspx?ID=375), [darkwood](/Equipment.aspx?ID=376), or [silver](/Equipment.aspx?ID=379). Any Strike that gets extra positive damage from this use of Slayer's Strike also gets the benefits of the rune or counts as that material.

 At 14th level, add [adamantine](/Equipment.aspx?ID=374) and [mithral](/Equipment.aspx?ID=377) to the list of materials you can choose from.
name: Slayer's Blessing
